name: Data Escape (HeavensGates)
description:
Controls:

Left/Right Arrow: move left or right respectively

Up Arrow: Jump over obstacles.

Down Arrow: Slide under obstacles.

Objective: Survive as long as possible, get coins to maximise score

Extra background:

This was a game inspired by subway surfer which I tried to create in 2 days (16 hours). The objective was to learn Input actions and procedural animations in unity.
